answer:
For information about who is eligible for free Hepatitis B vaccine check here.  To find out if the Hepatitis B vaccine series is recommended for you, contact your local health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse. You will find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I have been diagnosed with Fatty Liver disease and my GP has had me tested and I do NOT have immunity to Hep B. She suggested I may be eligible for the free vaccination.
